title: The Unfaithful
occurrences: Come on, say it isn't true. Say you're not a liar, that you weren't unfaithful.
Is there ever a time a man understands when his wife's been unfaithful to him?
I don't intent to make light of the fact that she was unfaithful.
Mrs Hunter wouldn't have been unfaithful if her husband hadn't been overseas.
